name: Squinty & Pasty: Dungeye of the Unknown
name_original: Squinty & Pasty: Dungeye of the Unknown
description:
"Do you ever think about how the world is more and more tasteless..?"

Squinty & Pasty : Dungeye of the Unknown  is a die-and-retry platformer where you play Squinty the eye and Pasty the mouth trying to escape the
Dungeye of the Unknown.

Created for the 37th GMC GameJam (May 28th - June 1st)

Theme: It Knows something you don't

First game ever created by :

  • Tristan ZendSeeker (Game development and Asset integration)
  • Valentin (Pixel-art)
  • Biou (Music and Sound design)
